Last compilation build time in utc format
Disable all and simulate the no-op library and plugin
Force enabling our library for release builds of your app
Disable including this module sources in your apk
Disable source features and source inclusion
Disable opening our UI on device shake
Enable a permanent overlay icon to open our UI
Disable showing our notification to open the UI
Propagate unhandled exceptions to the default handler (for Crashlytics and similar)
Enable debug mode for the library. It print extra logs and include our sources to your compilation
Default email to use for reports

This compilation contains some tools that are locally recording your usage. Nothing will be send without your explicit consent, only you can do it by using our reporting feature.\n\nIf you don\'t know what this is or you are not agree, tap disable.

We require \'Draw over other apps\' permission to show our interface over your activity. We will never show it over other apps, only over your app.\n\nOn next screen you have to accept it, then press back button.

Our interface will pop up if your app crash.

You can inspect your running app at any time by shaking your device, tapping our notification or programmatically using Iadt.show().

You can also open it now.
Your app need to be restarted for a clean startup without our tools.\n\nTip: You can re-enable them by cleaning this application data.
InApp DevTools require \'draw over other apps\' permission
The scenic panic make you pressed that button :)
Simulated crash on a background thread
